title: Star Trek: The Next Generation MicroHD 1080p Full Series (ES/EN)
description:
HI guys, I want to share with u my own Star Trek TNG Series rip.
Its MicroHD 1080p quality, ripped directly from the bluray. In includes Spanish and English AC3 audio (last season is Latino and English)

The first season is a webdl 720p quality, but the rest of them are microHD 1080p.

It took me a while to rip , so I hope u enjoy it.
